articles.title: Is Mahua Moitra targeted for being an English-speaking MP: Rajdeep Sardesai shamelessly defends TMC MP, casts aspersions on Darshan Hiranandani instead - OpIndia
articles.description: Rajdeep Sardesai tried to garner sympathy for Mahua Moitra by claiming that she chose to return to India and serve grassroots politics despite studying at an American University and working as an investment banker. | OpIndia News
